channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Celebrate Micro-Small, and Medium-sized Enterprises Day with Cloudflare 】庆祝中小微企业日与Cloudflare一起
item.description: 【 To celebrate United Nations Micro, Small, and Medium Sized Enterprises Day, Cloudflare is sharing success stories of small businesses building and growing on our platform. 】 To celebrate United Nations Micro, Small, and Medium Sized Enterprises Day, Cloudflare is sharing success stories of small businesses building and growing on our platform.

item.title: 【Building agents with OpenAI and Cloudflare’s Agents SDK】使用 OpenAI 和 Cloudflare 的 Agents SDK 构建代理
item.description: 【 We’re building AI agents where logic and reasoning are handled by OpenAI’s Agents SDK, and execution happens across Cloudflare's global network via Cloudflare’s Agents SDK. 】我们正在构建AI代理，其中逻辑和推理由OpenAI的代理SDK处理，执行通过Cloudflare的代理SDK在Cloudflare的全球网络上进行。

item.title: 【Message Signatures are now part of our Verified Bots Program, simplifying bot authentication】消息签名现在是我们的认证机器人计划的一部分，简化了机器人身份验证
item.description: 【 Bots can start authenticating to Cloudflare using public key cryptography, preventing them from being spoofed and allowing origins to have confidence in their identity. 】机器人可以使用公钥密码学开始对Cloudflare进行身份验证，防止被伪造，并使来源能够对其身份有信心。

item.title: 【Russian Internet users are unable to access the open Internet】俄罗斯互联网用户无法访问开放的互联网
item.description: 【 Since June 9, 2025, Internet users located in Russia and connecting to the open Internet have been throttled by Russian Internet Service Providers (ISPs). 】自2025年6月9日起，位于俄罗斯并连接到开放互联网的互联网用户已被俄罗斯互联网服务提供商（ISP）限制。

item.title: 【Content Independence Day: no AI crawl without compensation!】内容独立日：没有补偿就没有AI抓取！
item.description: 【 It’s Content Independence Day: Cloudflare, along with a majority of the world's leading publishers and AI companies, is changing the default to block AI crawlers unless they pay creators for content. 】它是内容独立日：Cloudflare，以及世界上大多数领先的出版商和人工智能公司，正在改变默认设置，除非他们为内容支付创作者费用，否则将阻止人工智能爬虫。

item.title: 【Introducing pay per crawl: enabling content owners to charge AI crawlers for access】引入按爬取付费：使内容所有者能够对AI爬虫的访问收费
item.description: 【 Pay per crawl is a new feature to allow content creators to charge AI crawlers for access to their content. 】按次爬取是一项新功能，允许内容创作者对其内容的访问向AI爬虫收费。

item.title: 【The crawl before the fall… of referrals: understanding AI’s impact on content providers】坠落前的爬升……推荐机制的影响：理解人工智能对内容提供者的影响
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Radar now shows how often a given AI model sends traffic to a site relative to how often it crawls that site. This helps site owners make decisions about which AI bots to allow or block. 】Cloudflare Radar现在显示给定AI模型向网站发送流量的频率，相对于其爬取该网站的频率。这有助于网站所有者决定允许或阻止哪些AI机器人。

item.title: 【Control content use for AI training with Cloudflare’s managed robots.txt and blocking for monetized content】使用 Cloudflare 的托管 robots.txt 和针对付费内容的阻止功能来控制内容使用以用于人工智能训练
item.description: 【 Cloudflare is making it easier for publishers and content creators of all sizes to prevent their content from being scraped for AI training by managing robots.txt on their behalf. 】Cloudflare 正在使所有规模的出版商和内容创作者更容易防止其内容被用于人工智能训练的抓取，方法是代表他们管理 robots.txt。

item.title: 【From Googlebot to GPTBot: who’s crawling your site in 2025】从Googlebot到GPTBot：2025年谁在爬取您的网站
item.description: 【 From May 2024 to May 2025, crawler traffic rose 18%, with GPTBot growing 305% and Googlebot 96%. 】从2024年5月到2025年5月，爬虫流量增长了18%，其中GPTBot增长了305%，Googlebot增长了96%。

item.title: 【Orange Me2eets: We made an end-to-end encrypted video calling app and it was easy】橙色Me2eets：我们开发了一款端到端加密的视频通话应用，而且很简单
item.description: 【 Orange Meets, our open-source video calling web application, now supports end-to-end encryption using the MLS protocol with continuous group key agreement. 】橙色会面，我们的开源视频通话网络应用，现在支持使用MLS协议的端到端加密，以及持续的组密钥协议。
